reviews.text: For some reason I canâ€™t find T2 Pastamania . Thank Michelle helping me to check QR code payments. Excellent service for family . Service level - first class at T2 #03-22. Will come again . Hope Airport add Apple Pay in their system .

Relaxing place with a quiet environment where you can truly enjoy your meal with loved ones.. Meals are served quickly and service staff is good.

There is ample space for a crowd to dine in.  Low calorie vegetarian meals are available along with other normal meat meals. There is a variety of Pasta, Pizza along with other food dishes. Drinks are available with a variety of selection including, soft drinks  fruit drinks, hot chocolates and  hot coffee.

Great restaurant to have a peaceful meal. In basement 2 of terminal 3.

We tried hot Milo, curry vegetarian fusion pasta and vegetarian low calorie pizza. Pasta was awesome and tasty. But spicy.

Prices are mid range. Service is good. Food served faster than we expected. Since not much crowded was able to enjoy the meal. Anyway it's a large place and can occupy a large crowd.

Awesome to have pasta & pizza served here in Pastamania at Changi Intrrnational Airport terminal 3. Great for quick bite-and-go before your flight. Seatings are quite minimal and circulation's too narrow for majority who bring luggages, otherwise everything is great.
Usual fare expected of the Pastamania chain. The food is below average.
